ICE::

She smiled. "I had no intention of hurting you. Veratis brought you 
here for a reason. I am not sure what that reason is, but it must be 
good if he wanted you here. You showed yourself to be a good warrior. 
I shall be honored to fight along side you."

She looked as FoxFingers stormed off. She chuckled. "Lunarpine, must 
you tease him so? After all, he's only a little guy. We have to help 
protect him."  She walked over and transformed into bot mode. She 
leaned down and kissed Lunarpine on the cheek. "I'd have done the 
same for you, you know. And thank you for letting me fight on this 
one. It felt good to 'stretch my wings again', so to speak."
She smiled warmly at him.

She turned to Veratis."Class? What class? Your not going to give 
homework like at the acadamy are you?" she said with a smirk on her 
face.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw looked out of the CR chamber in awe as he smiled. "You 
know the
> rules of war, There are no rules so you beat me fairly." Without 
the symbol
> to remind him he no longer fealt the link with the war. "If we're 
not here
> to fight this war then why was I created?"
> 
> Veratis stepped forward to answer the question. "We're here to save 
our
> race." he checked the settings for any viral output, not finding 
any he
> stepped away. "When you're out you, Lunarpine and Ice will attend 
class.
> Hopefully then you will understand the prophecy."
> 
> Foxfingers looked to Lunarpine and Ice, "Thanks for the save back 
there, I'm
> not sure what would've happened if you two hadn't stepped in."
> 
> Lunarpine answered quickly and sarcastically, "Didn't have much of 
a choice
> Fox, it was either bail you out or pick you up piece by piece." he 
laughed
> when he said that and Foxfingers turned in a huffy manner and 
stomped out
> like a tantrumed child.
